subject: Enquiry
description_text:
Good evening,

I was wondering if there was an option to buy a UK plug version for the
power supply on the VAM pro haptic

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Aidan Hughes,    We have four types of plugs, including the UK plug. By default, we will ship the appropriate plug based on the destination country of your shipping address.
Hi Aidan Hughes,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
